inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: genetic tests confirming mutation(s) in NT5E and evidence of lower extremity arterial calcifications

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willingness and legal ability to give and sign informed study consent

inclusion.criterion: travel to NIH and local sites
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: willingness to travel to NIH and local sites for scheduled protocol studies and treatment

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and meets the age criteria. However, they do not meet the exclusion criterion for diagnosed with ACDC.
